main

Class Prefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Prefs

  • public abstract class Prefs
extends java.lang.Object
    an abstract class that will read to and write from a .properties file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Prefs() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String read(java.lang.String property)
      will read a specific property from the prefs file
      static java.lang.String[] readAll()
      will return all of the data in the Prefs file as a string array
      static void write()
      will write the default settings to the prefs file
      static void write(java.lang.String[] settings)
      given a string of setting will write to the preference file

    • Method Detail

      • write

        public static void write(java.lang.String[] settings)
        given a string of setting will write to the preference file
        Parameters:
        settings - a string array of the settings to write in order {difficulty, sound, question, background Color}
